condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Emergency response in the childprotection area

description.narrative: During 2019, UNICEF CO provided technical and financial support to provide temporary resting spaces at immigration checkpoints; implementation of child-friendly spaces in different locations; provide legal advice and psycho-social support to families on the mov; and, through a cash-based intervention (CBI), provide alternative protection measurements (boarding and meals) for unaccompanied or separated children while waiting immigration to approve their entrance into Ecuador. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: # of girls and boys provided with psychosocial support including access to CFSs with intersectoral programming interventions
# of people subject to immigration/asylum procedures have access to adequate information and legal assistance
# of unaccompanied and separated children provided with family or community based care and appropriate specialized services
